elevatorsystem.elevator

Class Elevator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • elevatorsystem.elevator.Elevator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    nl.fontys.sevenlo.hwio.BitListener

    public class Elevator
extends java.util.Observable
implements nl.fontys.sevenlo.hwio.BitListener
    This class was created by timwedde on 19.11.15. This class depicts an elevator. It has state and all necessary operations in it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Elevator(nl.fontys.sevenlo.hwio.BitAggregate warrior)
      Initializes the hardware by moving to the lowest floor and thus creating a concrete state.

      • goTo

        public void goTo(int floor)
        Will move the physical cage to the specified floor. Serves as abstraction of the movement process and handles state change for this part.
        Parameters:
        floor - The floor to go to

      • indicateUp

        public void indicateUp()

        public void indicateIdle()

      • updateBit

        public void updateBit(java.lang.Object o,
                      boolean b)
        Fires everytime a bit changes on the specific chip tied to this elevator. The elevator will then take care of it appropriately and either update the state or the server depending on what event occured.
        Specified by:
        updateBit in interface nl.fontys.sevenlo.hwio.BitListener
        Parameters:
        o - The bit that triggered the update
        b - The value that it was set to

      • openDoor

        Opens the door of the elevator.

        public void closeDoor()
        Closes the door of the elevator.

      • giveLabel

        public void giveLabel(javax.swing.JLabel l)
        Parameters:
        l - The label to update with the current state.
